title: My Google pixel has a big audio issue . I can't make calls can't record anything . Please help me...
content:
I have audio related issue with my phone. I can't make calls or record anything. The phone just freezes and stops working 
 The system ui stops working . This means a lot to me . I am very heartbroken with this experience . Please help me . Tell me if there is any way of fixing this issue . Please take the necessary action.
